1: ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs med shin tu <mistake>dga'b</mistake> dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs <mistake>te//rta</mistake> mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes <mistake>pa'o///sangs</mistake>
2: <mistake>rgas</mistake> thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu <mistake>pa'o///de</mistake> <mistake>laji</mistake> ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe <mistake>na//skyon</mistake> <mistake>medg</mistake> <mistake>rag</mistake> pa
3: gtan du <mistake>ni//'dong</mistake> chags thams cad rjes chags phyir//de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das//'dod chags chen po <mistake>dga'b</mistake> che <mistake>zhes//rji</mistake> ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin <mistake>zhi</mistake> na/
4: gtan du dga' ba kun gyi <mistake>mchog /gdod</mistake> nas grol <mistake>pa</mistake> de bzhin gshegs//kun <mistake>du</mistake> bzang <mistake>o</mistake> kun gyi <mistake>bdag /byang</mistake> chub sems mchog cho ga'o//de <mistake>rje</mistake> ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
5: gtso <mistake>ba</mistake> yin zhe <mistake>na //dngos</mistake> grub chen po kun gyi <mistake>mchog /dbang</mistake> phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis//rdo rje dbang chen thugs <mistake>khar</mistake> bsgyur//rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i <mistake>grtso//dam</mistake> pa'i dang po <mistake>kyes</mistake> <mistake>bu'o //de</mistake> la ji
6: ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe <mistake>na//bsam</mistake> med rgya chen zab <mistake>ba</mistake> ni//dngos grub thams cad zad med <mistake>pa//kun</mistake> gyi dri ma med pa ni//byang chub sems bdag <mistake>bstun</mistake> pa
7: yin//de nas de'i yongs su las kyi <mistake>khad</mistake> par <mistake>ni/soms</mistake> brtan <mistake>nd</mistake> kyis sems dpa' <mistake>ste//teng</mistake> 'dzin sems dpa' <mistake>bsgo</mistake> <mistake>ba'o//rnam</mistake> par shes pa sems dpa' <mistake>te//rdo</mistake> rje nyid yin rdo rje las//
8: rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o//rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni//nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs <mistake>pa//zlaba</mistake> <mistake>'dr</mistake> bar yang dag blo//rdo rje zhes su rnam par bshad//de la ji ltar <mistake>b@om</mistake> ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
